title: Sandi Kuthira Lyrics Kaaviya Thalaivan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Sandi Kudhira
Singer: Haricharan
Music: A.R.Rahman
Lyrics: Pa. Vijay
Movie: Kaaviya Thalaivan

Hey Sandi Kudhira Vaayendi Edhira
Madhura Kudhira Edhire Vandha
Mohana Mohana
Naanum Un Maamana
Maaravaa Bheemana?
Vaayyen Kitta kitta
Vaaya Thachi Vitta (2)

Ah Ha Eee Ammaayi
Aazhakukku Naaku
Oo Ooh Ae Un Munne
Moraikadhey ye Paarthu

Hey Sandi Kudhira Vaayendi Edhira
Madhura Kudhira Edhire Vandha

Yaana Kutti Poona Kutti
Aattu Kutti aandha Kutty
Maan Kutty
Unna Naanum Mallu Kaatti
Thooka Poraen
Kannu kutty Ponnu kutty
Vaayaakatti Veikkaporaen

Muyale Muyale Muzhikum Muyale
Edhire Irukku Azhagu Mudhala

Ah Ha Eee Ammaayi
Aazhakukku Naaku
Oo Ooh Ae Un Munne
Moraikadhey ye Paarthu
Mohana Mohana
Naanum Un Maamana
Maaravaa Bheemana?

Naaname Mounama Kaaviyam Paesuma
Premaiye Kovama
Pechu Kaachu Moochu
Mookarundhu Pochu

Thendrale Thendrale Kovama Nenjile
Suthudhey Thingale
NadagathuUlle Naanga Vacha Mullae
Kuyile Kuyile Kuraikum Kuyile
Vellakaaran Vitta railey

Nataka Pitaka Othukaa ah Pokka
Attika Aanakirukka Etikana ah Mookka

Hey Sandi Kudhira Vaayendi Edhira
Madhura Kudhira Edhire Vandha
Mohana Mohana
Naanum Un Maamana
Maaravaa Bheemana?

Adiye Kudhira Vedi
Anjarana Seeni Vedi
Vanna Vanna Vaana Vedi
Kutuvedi Pottuvedi
Athanai Vedigalume
Anjula Minjura Vedi
Unnudaiya Pechuvedi
Ullabadi Ullathadi

Ananan ne ney
Annilenne Kathai Ennae
Purinjudhune Muyalenne
Therinjudhu Anne
Pen Maane Thene
Thirunthunna Pothunnea

Yaana Kutti Poona Kutti
Aattu Kutti Kannu Kutty
Annil Kutty aandha Kutty
Nari Kutty Puli Kutty
Karadi Kutty Kuthira Kutty
Kuyilu Kutty Mayilu Kutty
Kozhi Kutty Eli Kutty
Maan Kutty Mannu Kutty
Intha Kutty Endha Kutty
Vaayadum Kathu kutty Kathu kutty
jammeenu Pattu Kutty Chuttu kutty
Ennoda Ella Kutty Chella Kuutty
Vella katti vella katti
